riddle1.title: Start your riddle adventure here
riddle1.riddle:
Welcome a new adventure. Let's start with riddle 1.  
 I can be tuned, I can be fast, Racers love me, but I’m hard to pass. I’m seen on highways, streets, and tracks, Steer me well, or you'll end up back.

riddle2.title: Riddle 1 answer
riddle2.riddle: In the heart of Los Santos, I stand tall, The rich come to visit, the poor take the fall. I can be a home, a heist, or just a tour, When the lights are out, I’m hard to ignore.

riddle3.title: Riddle 2 answer
riddle3.riddle: I’m where you go when things go south, I might take your car or empty your mouth. A place that’s both feared and relieved, If you break the law, I’m where you’re received.
